Package application

Class AccountDatabase

java.lang.Object
application.AccountDatabase
public class AccountDatabase
extends Object
Representation of an Account Database including list of accounts, increment value, size and necessary methods
Author:
Devin Macalalad, David Gasperini

  • Method Details

    • find

      private int find​(Account account)
      Find the account and return its account index if found
      Parameters:
      account - : account to search for in accounts
      Returns:
      int : index if index of the match, -1 if account not found

    • grow

      private void grow()
      Grows the array linearly by a constant increment

    • add

      public boolean add​(Account account)
      Add a new account to the database
      Parameters:
      account - : adds a new account to the database
      Returns:
      boolean : true if account added successfully, false if account already exists

    • remove

      public boolean remove​(Account account)
      removes an account from the database
      Parameters:
      account - : account to remove
      Returns:
      boolean : true if removed successfully, false if account not found

    • deposit

      public boolean deposit​(Account account, double amount)
      deposit funds to account
      Parameters:
      account - : account to deposit into
      amount - : quantity to deposit
      Returns:
      boolean : true if success, false if account not found

    • withdrawal

      public int withdrawal​(Account account, double amount)
      withdrawal funds from account
      Parameters:
      account - : account to withdrawal from
      amount - : quantity to withdrawal
      Returns:
      int : 1 if insufficient balance, -1 if account not found, 0 if success

      display - : textArea to append to

      public int getSize()
      accessor for size
      Returns:

    • formatDatabaseForStorage

      public String formatDatabaseForStorage()
      Package accounts database for storage
      Returns:
      String : formatted string of all account entries

    • bubbleSort

      private void bubbleSort​(boolean byDate)
      Helper method to perform the sorting for sortByDate and sortByLastName
      Parameters:
      byDate - : if true sorts by date opened, if false sorts by holders last name
